rooms.description: Spacious open-plan living area combined with the kitchen. Features an eco-friendly design with natural ventilation, ample daylighting through large windows and a central skylight, energy-efficient LED lighting fixtures.
An adjoining dining area integrated into the living space with sustainable materials and low VOC finishes. Incorporates built-in furniture to reduce waste.
Master bedroom with a private balcony designed for relaxation, ensuring privacy and natural light. Features green building materials and energy-efficient appliances.
Secondary bedroom with a spacious balcony, optimized for air circulation and natural light. Uses sustainable insulation materials.
Additional bedroom with a balcony, designed for quietude and ventilation. Utilizes eco-friendly materials.
Fourth bedroom with a balcony, ensuring ample daylight and cross ventilation. Incorporates natural light optimization techniques.
Fifth bedroom with a balcony, designed for energy efficiency and balanced aesthetics per Vastu principles.
Sixth bedroom with a balcony, promoting eco-friendly living through passive cooling and renewable energy integration.
Dedicated study area with natural light, ergonomic design using sustainable wood, ensuring minimal environmental impact.
Master bathroom with eco-friendly fixtures and water-saving fittings. Designed for functionality and aesthetic balance per local norms.

openings.description: Main entrance door with energy-efficient design, integrated security features. Positioned on the auspicious east or north face according to Vastu.
Large side windows for natural ventilation and lighting across living areas and bedrooms. Blends local architectural style with eco-friendly glazing materials.
Central skylight in the living area to enhance daylighting, reduce energy usage, and promote a connection with nature.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom featuring a private balcony for additional daylight and ventilation. Utilizes sustainable, locally-sourced materials.
Guest room with a balcony ensuring comfort and privacy. Incorporates eco-friendly design elements and passive cooling strategies.
Private study area with ample natural light, sound insulation using recycled materials. Designed to promote productivity and a connection with nature.

openings.description: Large windows on the upper floor designed for cross ventilation, natural light, and to enhance views while maintaining energy efficiency.
Rear door providing access from the upper level to outdoor spaces. Designed with security in mind and adherence to local building norms.
